notes: The Corpus NGT is a collection of data from deaf signers using Sign Language of the Netherlands (NGT). The data consist of recordings with multiple synchronised video cameras, accompanied by gloss and translation annotations.
title: Corpus Nederlandse Gebarentaal (CNGT)
